versions.release_notes:
***Update*** 
1. Alan Walker's electric work - Alone is released! 
2. New missions. level effects. come and challenge! Get music experiences different from Faded! 
3. The album Wei II has been opened for free trial! Do not miss it!

***Update***
1. Alan Walker's electric work - Alone is released!
2. New missions, level effects, come and challenge! Get music experiences different from Faded!
3. The album Wei II has been opened for free trial! Do not miss it!

***3rd Anniversary Carnival***
1. Disk of 3rd Anniversary comes to bring you countless childlike joys.
2. 3rd Anniversary event gives you the charm of growth in musical environment.
3. 8 original songs in the entirely new album of 3rd anniversary. Come to challenge!
***Update*** \nEntirely new store with rich content to be bought!
***Update*** \n1. Super Latin hit worldwide - Despacito on field! \n2. Entirely new mission of fragments collecting and generous fragment bonus.
Emergency bug fix.
***Update*** \n1. Super Latin hit worldwide - Despacito on field! \n2. Entirely new mission of fragments collecting and generous fragment bonus.

*** World Cup is here*** 
1. Play the World Cup event and begin your football journey! 
2. Promotion limited in store: Revival pack ready for sale; 
3. Update to get World Cup disk

***Update*** 
【Journey Of Star】New event is coming! Adventure in Folk. classic and pop music. 
1. 1 music theme every week. 8 refined levels. Get great bonus after finishing the level. 
2. Enjoy the selected music and be your own super star in Piano Tiles!!

***Update*** 
【Journey Of Star】New event is coming! Adventure in Folk. classic and pop music. 
1. 1 music theme every week. 8 refined levels. Get great bonus after finishing the level. 
2. Enjoy the selected music and be your own super star in Piano Tiles!!
***Update***\n1. Privilege to remove intersititial and get a more fluent experience. \n2. Optimization of lags in FADED!
Updated Terms of Service...
Updated Terms of Service...
***Great Update*** \nElectro super popular around the world - Faded is launched! \nNew request with detailed design. animation et special effects! Come and take the challenge!
Selected songs are free in limited time during weekend! Enjoy it!
1. Rush: New update of tools. Let's enjoy a cheerful beginning. \n2. Music keys: can be gained by coins! Come and try.
Bug fix.
1. Add "Music Key" exclusive songs. Waiting for you to unlock. \n2. Optimize the "lucky turntable". Receive free reward one time a day!

White Valentine's Day comes and check your event invitations! 
1. 3 grade songs are added. The music level is raised to 121. 
2. Add "Music Key" exclusive songs. Waiting for you to unlock. 
3. Optimize the "lucky turntable". Receive free reward one time a day!  
Challenge any songs to collect love coins and convertible "pumpkin carriage" and other props. 
Complete the dress collection. winning props and white Valentine's exclusive songs rewards.
1. New Christmas dressing up system is online. DIY your own Christmas tree;\n2 New Year instances are added. Rich rewards are free to get;\n3. The highest level is upgraded to 118!

1. New Christmas disk is added. Come and get free disk;\n2. A new Christmas instance is added. Challenge to get Christmas reward;\n3.Christmas Diamond pack and Christmas album are at a discount. Waiting for you~

Halloween version comes ~ 
1. New songs recommended feature is added. and demo songs are free! 
2. Game background is added. and each disk has a different set of game background! 
3. Song entrance is added in new result page. so you can quickly collect favorite songs! 
4. New disks. albums and songs are added! 
5. Halloween instance is opened on October 24!

Piano Tiles 2™ is two years old! Second anniversary version is here! New gameplay and new interface bring more excitement. 
1. Brand new orchestrated songs ‘Simple Gift’, ‘Bluestone Alley-Adapted’ and ‘Maybe see you after four years’!  Completely new experience!
2. Change your 8 exclusive disks freely in the new disk collection system. 
3. New gameplay - burst tiles: Just explode, piano tiles! 
4. Get exclusive benefits for free in the 2nd anniversary copy. 
5. Exclusive tasks of second anniversary, mysterious songs and more surprises are waiting for you! 
6. Fixed bugs for smoother gaming experience.

Piano Tiles 2™ is two years old! Second anniversary version is here! New gameplay and new interface bring more excitement. 
1. Brand new orchestrated songs ‘Simple Gift’, ‘Bluestone Alley-Adapted’ and ‘Maybe see you after four years’!  Completely new experience!
2. Change your 8 exclusive disks freely in the new disk collection system. 
3. New gameplay - burst tiles: Just explode, piano tiles! 
4. Get exclusive benefits for free in the 2nd anniversary copy. 
5. There are more music albums, more original songs and more new games. Play classical songs by a new feeling. 
6. Exclusive tasks of second anniversary, mysterious songs and more surprises are waiting for you!

New version has been updated in July. New benefits: 
1. Piano Tiles 2 is about two years old! Come and book exclusive songs of the second anniversary at the ultra-low discount! 
2. There will be super packages from July 8 to July 16. Don’t miss the limited offer. 
3. New function about removing ads are added.

1. New gameplay accompaniment shows the most authentic piano performance! 
2. "Classic" tile challenge is added recently.Come and try the accompaniment gameplay and the classical gameplay.
3. Create your exclusive playlist and play the unique songs!
4. Added 2 new album! 
5. Added 1 new songs to unlock by watching video and 8 new selected songs. Level up to 107!

1. After the update, Facebook players must reconnect. Thanks for your support!
2. Tile Challenge launched! Brand new speed challenge is waiting for you! 
3. Optimized pop-up for unlocking songs, receive the newest song just in time! 
4. Optimized music platform jumping process, shorten your waiting time. 
5. Improved song recommending function, come first to try new locked songs. 
6. Added 4 new album! 
7. Added 2 new songs to unlock by watching video and 13 new selected songs. Level up to 105!
1.Some bugs have been fixed.

1. Brand new Song-recommend function added! And free trail!
2.Easter dynamic album art! Collect cover pieces to get! 
3. Mysterious Easter events are coming, free songs and huge rewards are waiting for you!
4. 10 new selected songs and levels up to 102

1. New songs added: Kiss the rain and River flows in you. Watch video to unlock!
2. Added music chart, get songs' world ranking at a glance.
3. Launched everyday quest system, hard work pays off!
4. Added 10 new songs, levels up to 99.

1. Valentine's Day special version, 3 original songs with listening option! 
2. New function of sharing love letters to make unique Valentine! 
3. Valentine's Day skin for a limited time is waiting for you! 
4. Level up to 94!

If the game won't load after the update, please don't hesitate to contact us: gpfeedbackpt2@gmail.com or WhatsApp (+86 18027310572). We will help you as soon as possible. And you will receive rewards for helping us locate the problem. 100 diamonds for the play who helps to solve the bug. Thank you! 

Improved again!! Come have a try!
1. Celebrate the upcoming Spring Festival, new updated Spring Festival skin, new songs, and mysterious Spring Festival activities are waiting for you!  
2. New Achievement System Added!
3. Add 3 new music albums, which brings you a refreshing musical experience! 
4. Max level up to 91! New year, new beginning!
Some bugs have been fixed.

1. Celebrate the upcoming Spring Festival, new updated Spring Festival skin, new songs, and mysterious Spring Festival activities are waiting for you! 
2. New Achievement System Added!
3. Add 3 new music albums, which brings you a refreshing musical experience! 
4. Max level up to 91! New year, new beginning!
The bug has been solved to have a better experience of Christmas version.
1.Master's challenge kicks off! Reach the peak experience of speed challenge.\n2.New album "Time Corner", refreshing and entirely new music!\n3.Level up to 84, and more agreeable music is waiting!
Optimized touching experience of iOS 10. \nFixed bug of Halloween version to let you enjoy more.

1.Halloween level up! Come and grab diamond sugar!
2.New Halloween mysterious activity is waiting for your in Halloween version.
3.New album and songs about Halloween.
4.New favorite instruction to help you add songs to your favorites.
5.Max level 79 and more songs are coming!

1. Brand new slider tile gamplay, let you enjoy the controll by your finger and the pleasure of playing the piano! 
2. Update to get recommended song Warblings At Eve and try the brand new slider tile gameplay! 
3. Added new album Album of "Slider" tile, Album of girlish worries and Album I of natural scenery 
4. Indonessian is available now! 
5. Levels up to 74

2. Song of recommendation: 《Moonlight Sonata Mvt.1》, update the game to win it for free!
3. Added albums: 《Album of moon》,《Album I of world selection》,《Album of animal》, for an extraordinary musical experience.
4. Turkish is added in the game.

store_info.title: Piano Tiles 2™
store_info.description:
More rhythmic music, more exciting gameplay, more challenging levels, etc.
Play the anniversary carnival of Piano Tiles 2™ with 1.1 billion players around the world!

Game feature: 
1. Simple graphics, easy to play and everybody gets playing the piano! 
2. Breath-taking rhythm will challenge your handspeed limit! 
3. Top challenge mode gives you thrill and risk! 
4. Update of numerous songs, original, classic, bangs and all the style to satisfy different taste.
5. Share your record with your friends, and compare with world-wide players on the ranking list! 
6. Sound of high quality makes you feel like in a concert. 
7. Save your progress via Facebook account and share the progress in different devices. 
8. More challenge, more bonus and a better self. 

Gaming mode: Don't tap the white tiles! Tap the black tiles according to the melody and don't miss any tile! Concentrate yourself and maximize your reaction! 

Support: If you have any question, please send it to gpfeedbackpt2@gmail.com, or you can go to the settings - help and support to contact us. We will solve your problem asap. 

Business Corporation: Cheetah Games is willing to cooperate with all the top game developers world-wide to create games. We are looking forward to your excellent games. 
Please contact us: cheetahgames@cmcm.com.

Privacy Policy: http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/privacy.html 
TOS Privacy：http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/tos.html 
Ad Choice：http://www.cmcm.com/protocol/site/ad-choice.html
store_info.subtitle: Don't Tap The White Tile 2
